channel.title: HELP ME -private server item help
channel.description:
:( wel i am trying to change my private server when i tryed to open the autospawn file it wouldnt let me open it do i had to change it to another program so i changed it to notepad now all of those files open
i wanted to change things in the shops but when open the shop file and put the code in the price and save it it does nothing. nothing changes
can somone please help thanxx :)

item.description:
@jt1 wrote:

ok ill try all that i have tryed closen it then re open it [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:44:04 PM[/size][hr]i dont have shops.cfg i only got shops and it opens wit notpad [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:47:05 PM[/size][hr]ok im up to item ids where is the find thing where i type in law rune[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:52:59 PM[/size][hr]ctr f dw lol [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 10:55:38 PM[/size][hr]dude it dident wrok [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:00:24 PM[/size][hr]i dont have a shops.cfg file [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:01:37 PM[/size][hr]wat i did was i deleted everything is alburys shop theni loged out loged in and nuthen happend it still had the nubie stuff in there wtf ?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:06:35 PM[/size][hr]ok i mannaged to get a tax ket ull in alburys mage shop lol [br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:27:18 PM[/size][hr]i delted everythign in the shop now i got nuthen i type in the code for santa hat but still dident work ?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 18, 2006, 11:41:53 PM[/size][hr]yes i did it lol whoooooo

item.title: HELP ME -private server item help
item.dc:creator: @tyguy tyguy
item.description:
@tyguy wrote:

Well some stuff I can think of is

  1. Restart mopar(close then reopen server)
  2. Make sure in the autospawn/shops thing between each item id and how many you press Tab (to the left of the “Q” key)

So say you wanted a santa hat in the varrock general store it would look like this

  1. Code for santa hat is 1050
  2. Open Shops.cfg Look for Shop = 1 Varrock_General_Store
  3. After that you want to put 1050 (tab) how many
    4.If you would like to have nothing else but santa hats Download my file I put it in already for you!
    NOTE: take out of zip file before putting in your server
    If you would like to know a more about putting stuff in shops look here I did a tut on putting runes in a shop!
    http://moparscape0.tripod.com/
    NOTE: There are somethings all ready in it like the rune shop and ranged shop
    But download this and replace it with your old shop.cfg file and restart mopar

Read full topic
